19.eng-name: The Book of the Prayer for the Two 'Eids

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Umar bin Al-Khattab said:"The prayer of Al-Adha is two rak'ahs, the prayer of Al-Fitr is two rak'ahs, the prayer of the traveler is two rak'ahs and the jumu'ah prayer is two rak'ahs, complete and not shortened, upon the tongue of the Prophet (ﷺ)
